resources.string: We need access to your location to show you recreation opportunities near your current location. This data is not stored or shared.
Show your location on the map?
We need access to your location to show your location relative to recreation opportunities near you. This data is not stored or shared.
Use location to show nearby activities?
Allow location when not in use to show nearby activities?
Using the locations nearby functionality requires background access to your device\'s location
We use your location even when this app is closed to share nearby activities
